text: Hebi railway station () is a station on Beijing–Guangzhou railway in Qibin District, Hebi, Henan. ==History== The station was formerly known as Xunxian railway station (). It was changed to its current name in 1992 with the relocation of Hebi Prefecture People's Government. ==References== Category:Railway stations in Henan Category:Stations on the Beijing–Guangzhou Railway Category:Railway stations in China opened in 1904
title: Hebi railway station
